Articles.Content:
I\'m creating an aerial engine for a small project of mine, and I was wondering how to add the heat effects to the engine. If anyone could enlighten me on the subject, I would be most grateful.

Also, if this is in the wrong forum, please tell me.
*Slap* Radion, will you be releasing this to the public, and make one for I?

*Slap* Radion, will you be releasing this to the public, and make one for I?

I\'ll be selling it as a proprietary engine on the RP forum, property of Radion Industries. Of course, here, it\'ll only be a small engine that I might not even release here. It\'s all up to how it goes.

CardboardBoxProcessor wrote up a tutorial

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=13450.0

Thank you very much. I hadn\'t seen that one. I\'ll be sure to report back.
No problemo. It helped me a ton.
